label: Debug Zed Vars
command: bash -c 'echo "ZED_FILE: $ZED_FILE" && echo "ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT: $ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT" && echo "PWD: $PWD" && echo "Current dir from ZED_FILE: $(dirname "$ZED_FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo "ZED_FILE not set")" && echo "Press enter to continue..." && read'

label: Debug Oil Zed
command: bash -c 'TARGET_DIR="$(dirname "$ZED_FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo "$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT")" && echo "Target directory: $TARGET_DIR" && echo "Testing oil-zed..." && oil-zed --help 2>&1 || echo "oil-zed failed, trying direct call..." && which oil-zed && echo "Press enter to continue..." && read'

label: Debug Oil Float
command: bash -c 'TARGET_DIR="$(dirname "$ZED_FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo "$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT")" && echo "Target directory: $TARGET_DIR" && echo "Testing oil-float..." && oil-float --help 2>&1 || echo "oil-float failed, trying direct call..." && which oil-float && echo "Press enter to continue..." && read'

label: Debug Step by Step
command: bash -c 'echo "ZED_FILE: $ZED_FILE" && echo "Step 1: dirname of ZED_FILE" && STEP1=$(dirname "$ZED_FILE" 2>/dev/null) && echo "STEP1 result: $STEP1" && echo "Step 2: fallback check" && STEP2="$STEP1" && if [ -z "$STEP2" ]; then STEP2="$ZED_WORKTREE_ROOT"; fi && echo "STEP2 result: $STEP2" && echo "Step 3: calling oil-zed with: $STEP2" && echo "Press enter to continue..." && read'
